mapper.select: SELECT sinopec_petrol_num sinopecPetrolNum, petrolChina_petrol_num petrolchinaPetrolNum, user_account userAccount FROM czb_user LEFT JOIN czb_user_card_relation ON czb_user_card_relation.user_id = czb_user.user_id WHERE czb_user_card_relation.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into czb_direct_charging_commodity (commodity_id,account,discount,preferential_price,commodity_type,state,create_at,update_at) values ( #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{preferentialPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commodityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), NOW() )
